author: cardano4climate
title: Littlefish Foundation Kiva-like DAO
description: Limited TRUST in International Organizations, lack of transparency, and lack of involvement in fund allocation in SDG activities.
solution: A DAO inspired by kiva.org that funds SDG activists and builds opensource tech to make funding transparent, community driven and trust based
experience: Cardano4Climate team, Emurgo Instructor, Cardano Architecture & Design Developer Professional Student, Computer Engineer, NGO Managers.
